text: ninnalilarkkenkilum visvasinikalaya svatantra strikale vivaham kalikkan kaliyillenkil ninnalute adhinatayilulla visvasinikalaya atimastrikale vivaham ceyyam. ninnalute visvasatte sambandhicc nannayariyuka allahuvinan. ninnal ore vargattilpettavaranallea. atinal avare avarute raksitakkalute anuvadatteate ninnal vivaham kaliccukealluka. avarkk n'yayamaya vivahamulyam nalkanam. avar caritravatikalum durvrttiyilerppetattavarum rahasyavelcakkare svikarikkattavarumayirikkanam. annane avar dampatyavarutiyil vannasesam avar durvrttiyilerppetukayanenkil svatantra strikalute pati siksayan avarkkuntavuka. vivaham kaliccillenkil terr sambhaviccekkumenn bhayamullavarkk ventiyanit. ennal ksamayavalambikkunnatan ninnalkk kututaluttamam. allahu ere pearukkunnavanum paramadayaluvuman
